home.description: Expert travel consultancy for digital nomads, expats, and adventure seekers. Get personalized visa guidance, relocation support, and travel planning from experienced professionals.

home.hero.subtitle: Consultation that you can count on

home.journey.title: Begin your journey to new horizons

home.relocation.title: Relocating to a new country?
home.relocation.description: With personal real-world experience, our team has relocated in several countries. Reach out to us for expert advice in relocation.
home.nomad.title: Travel like a Nomad
home.nomad.description: Many people have dreams of the Nomadic lifestyle, but they may have no idea where to start. Let us help you start your Nomadic life.
home.everyone.title: For everyone else... Welcome to the world of Traveling
home.everyone.description: Many people work hard every day in order to care for their needs and families. Let's face it, vacations are a needed thing. Start by removing the pressure off of yourselves and take advantage of our expertise.
home.stories.title: Real life stories by real people on their
home.affiliates.title: Affiliates, Partners, Could be you...
home.affiliates.description: Whether you are a traveller with a company, nomad, or you have some other reason to be associated with TwoTrekkers; we love to spread the love. Let's Network...
travel.title: Travel Services & Tourism Planning - Two Trekkers Travel
travel.description: Comprehensive travel services and tourism planning. From adventure travel to luxury experiences, we help you create unforgettable journeys around the world.
travel.page.title: Tourism
travel.page.subtitle: The purpose behind tourism is to have a good time and enjoy the best parts of new places while away from your daily life. But planning a good vacation can be a lot of work.
travel.page.subtitle2: Now, it doesn't have to be...
travel.page.heading: The last thing that you want to do is have a bad vacation or get something different than what you thought you were paying for.
travel.page.content: The solution is to let us do that work for you. You may have always dreamed of going to a certain location for a vacation. While it's interesting to learn about a new place, the reality is that planning a successful trip takes a lot of time and effort. We will do all the homework for you so that you can skip the work and enjoy the trip. Take advantage of our services to offer you the best recommendations according to your preferences. With our expert tips and travel experience, allow us to provide you with insights and recommendations that can help you to save time and money, while getting the kind of trip you are truly looking for.
relocation.title: Expat Relocation Services & Visa Assistance - Two Trekkers Travel
relocation.description: Comprehensive expat relocation services and visa assistance. Get expert guidance for moving abroad, visa applications, and settling into your new country.
relocation.page.title: Living Abroad
relocation.page.subtitle: Living abroad or relocating can produce a number of unexpected challenges.
relocation.page.heading: The excitement, worries, and unknowns of living in a foreign land can be overwhelming.
relocation.page.content1: Cultures, customs, infrastructures, and languages are some of the hardest things to navigate in life. Going in blind to a country without having prior experience can ruin a big decision like relocating to a new place on the globe.
relocation.page.content2: We have proven experience and a wealth of knowledge and resources in order to help you succeed in making this big decision succeed. Make a lasting good memory rather than a dreadful nightmare. Consult with us in order to get the edge.
nomad.title: Digital Nomad Lifestyle & Remote Work Guidance - Two Trekkers Travel
nomad.description: Start your digital nomad journey with expert guidance. Learn about remote work destinations, nomad visas, and how to live and work from anywhere in the world.
nomad.page.title: Nomadic Life
nomad.page.subtitle: While many people on vacation meet nomads and assume they are rich or are living the dream life as if on a permanent vacation, we will teach you the tricks of what living as a nomad really means and how it differs from living abroad. You will find that it is simply another lifestyle.
nomad.page.subtitle2: And you will learn... How to live a Nomad life and not let the Nomad life live you.
nomad.page.heading: Nomads originated from ancient times. Whether making the long journey to their destination or searching for the next suitable spot to settle, their desire for adventure, changing circumstances, and new horizons spurred them on.
nomad.page.content1: Hospitality was a key for success. While on their journeys, they often met other nomads along the way. They would buy and sell goods and exchange news they brought from distant lands.
nomad.page.content2: The same is true today, true nomads are not ones who see what they can get from traveling, but rather what they can give to others while traveling. You will learn not only what it means to be a Nomad, but also the secrets along the way that can make your journey a success.
why.title: Why Choose Two Trekkers Travel - Expert Travel Consultancy
why.description: Discover why Two Trekkers Travel is your trusted partner for global tourism, digital nomad guidance, and expat relocation services.
why.page.title: Two Trekkers
why.page.subtitle: Experience the world with our expert team of travelers and digital nomads.
why.page.join.title: Join Us
why.page.join.description: Start your journey in the community of trekkers. We will help navigate you through your next experience, alleviating your stress and training one more person to become yet another trekker.
why.page.choose.title: Why Choose Us?
why.page.expertise.title: Expertise In Travel Consultancy
why.page.expertise.description: A consultant is one who is able to deliver valuable information based off of knowledge passed on to him or her through an experience. They are deemed to be an authority on matters in that, while they may not know everything there is to know on a matter, they do have a wealth of valuable knowledge, experience, and suggestions that can benefit you. We feel compelled to share our experience and accumulated knowledge through our travels with others in order to add value to their travels. As we continue to travel and experience new things, we continue to learn, to adapt, to change, to grow, and to share with others. While we do not consider our recommendations as the the only way to do things, we do believe that it is a professional response to allow our experience to speak for itself and to see if it aligns with your travel goals.
why.page.experience.title: Personal Experience
why.page.experience.description: There are still many countries we have yet to go to and places we have yet to see, but the value is not only in how many places a person has been, but rather in the quality of their travels and in the ability to integrate into society. In simple terms, if one is able to start in a location as a tourist, live as a nomad in a region, and then become a resident of an area, this becomes even more valuable as a knowledge base to draw on in order to succeed as a traveller. We bring this to the table for you to leverage. True success stories from A to Z.
why.page.insights.title: Cutting Edge Insights
why.page.insights.description: A knowledge base is only useful as much as it can be updated. We do our best to stay up to date on current events that can affect travel. The world is an ever unstable place, and therefore we keep our eye open for important changes that may affect traveling.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about travel, relocation, and digital nomad lifestyle.
faq.welcome: Welcome to our FAQ page! Here, we strive to provide you with the most relevant and helpful information. If you have a question that isn't covered here, please don't hesitate to reach out via email. We are committed to answering your inquiries and will post your question on this page if it is frequent and appropriate. Your engagement helps us improve and serve you better, so feel free to
faq.a1: We provide travel planning, relocation guidance, and digital-nomad consulting.
faq.a2: Book a session, share your goals, and we deliver tailored guidance and resources.
faq.q3: Do you support visa and relocation questions?
faq.a3: Yes. We help you understand options and prepare documents, with local insights.

privacy.title: TwoTrekkers Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Learn about TwoTrekkers' privacy practices and how we protect your data. Our comprehensive privacy policy covers data collection, usage, and your rights.
privacy.intro: At TwoTrekkers, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information when you visit our website.
privacy.info_collect.title: Information We Collect
privacy.info_collect.intro: We may collect the following types of information:
privacy.info_collect.personal: **Personal Information**: Name, email address, phone number, and any other information you provide when you contact us or use our services.
privacy.info_collect.usage: **Usage Data**: Information about how you use our website, including your IP address, browser type, and pages visited.
privacy.cookies.title: Cookies
privacy.cookies.content: We use cookies to enhance your user experience on our website. Cookies are small data files stored on your device that help us understand how you interact with our site. We do not track you in any way that is outside of normal web visiting behaviors. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.
privacy.use_info.title: How We Use Your Information
privacy.use_info.intro: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:
privacy.use_info.services: To provide and maintain our services.
privacy.use_info.communicate: To communicate with you, including responding to your inquiries.
privacy.use_info.improve: To improve our website and services based on user feedback.
privacy.use_info.note: We do not want your information unless you are involved in our services or collaboration.
privacy.security.title: Data Security
privacy.security.content: We take the security of your personal information seriously and implement reasonable measures to protect it. However, no method of transmission over the internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure.
privacy.sharing.title: Sharing Your Information
privacy.sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties without your consent, except as required by law or to protect our rights.
privacy.rights.title: Your Rights
privacy.rights.access: Access the personal information we hold about you.
privacy.rights.correction: Request correction of any inaccurate information.
privacy.rights.deletion: Request deletion of your personal information, subject to certain exceptions.
privacy.changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
privacy.changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page. Your continued use of the website after any changes constitutes your acceptance of the new policy.
privacy.contact.title: Contact Us
privacy.contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use or our Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
privacy.footer: Thank you for choosing TwoTrekkers for your travel consultancy needs!
terms.title: TwoTrekkers - Terms of Use
terms.description: Read TwoTrekkers' terms of use and service agreement. Understand your rights and responsibilities when using our travel consultancy services.
terms.acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
terms.acceptance.content: By accessing or using the TwoTrekkers website, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use our website.
terms.services.title: Services
terms.services.content: TwoTrekkers provides travel consultancy services, including but not limited to travel planning, itinerary creation, and travel advice. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue our services at any time without prior notice.
terms.responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
terms.responsibilities.intro: You agree to use the website only for lawful purposes. You may not:
terms.responsibilities.law: Violate any local, national, or international law or regulation.
terms.responsibilities.restrict: Restrict or inhibit the use of the website by others.
terms.responsibilities.advertising: Transmit any advertising or promotional material without our written consent.
terms.intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
terms.intellectual.content: All content on the TwoTrekkers website, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is owned by TwoTrekkers or its licensors and is protected by copyright and intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works from any content without our express written permission.
terms.liability.title: Limitation of Liability
terms.liability.content: To the fullest extent permitted by law, TwoTrekkers is not liable for any damages arising from your use or inability to use the website or services, including but not limited to direct, indirect, incidental, special, or punitive damages.
terms.changes.title: Changes to Terms
terms.changes.content: We may update these Terms of Use from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and your continued use of the website constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.
